Title: Elite Squad
Writer: André Batista (book), Bráulio Mantovani, José Padilha, Rodrigo Pimentel (book), Rodrigo Pimentel, Luiz Eduardo Soares (book)
Actors: Wagner Moura, André Ramiro, Caio Junqueira, Milhem Cortaz
Plot: 1997, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his occupation while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope comes to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
